course: BACHELOR OF SCIENCE IN INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY
profileDescription: I am skilled in multiple programming  languages and have a deep  understanding of software  development principles. I have  experience in creating efficient and  effective code for various platforms,  including desktop and web  applications. I am a critical thinker and  problem-solver, with the ability to  analyze complex systems and break  them down into smaller, manageable  parts. I am willing to learn and  contribute.
skills: Knowledge of coding languages  (e.g.Python,PHP, JavaScript, HTML,  CSS, TypeScript)
Frameworks/systems(e.g ReactJs,  React Native, ExpressJs, NodeJs,  ReduxJs, Git)
Familiarity with MVC pattern in  software design

jobResponsibilities: Work with developers to design algorithms
Produce clean, efficient code based on specifications
Troubleshoot, debug and upgrade existing software

certifications.certificationTitle: CCNAv7: Enterprise Networking, Security, and Automation
CCNAv7: Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials
